image.name: 1.jpg
image.caption: Man misses bus

image.name: A.jpg
image.caption: Wait for the next bus

image.name: B.jpg
image.caption: Call a taxi

image.name: C.jpg
image.caption: Steal a car

image.name: A1.jpg
image.caption: Get on the next bus

image.name: A2.jpg
image.caption: Miss the next bus as well

image.name: A3.jpg
image.caption: Meet woman at bus stop

image.name: B1.jpg
image.caption: Take taxi directly to job interview

image.name: B2.jpg
image.caption: Ride in taxi but not have enough money to pay

image.name: B3.jpg
image.caption: Make taxi stop at McDonalds

image.name: C1.jpg
image.caption: Take stolen car to job interview

image.name: C2.jpg
image.caption: Get in car chase with police

image.name: C3.jpg
image.caption: Stop at McDonalds with stolen car

image.name: A1I.jpg
image.caption: Make new friends on the bus

image.name: A1II.jpg
image.caption: Take bus directly to job interview

image.name: A1III.jpg
image.caption: Contract illness from bus door handle

image.name: A2I.jpg
image.caption: Try hitchhiking to job interview

image.name: A2II.jpg
image.caption: Jog to job interview

image.name: A2III.jpg
image.caption: Shrug, go to McDonalds instead

image.name: A3I.jpg
image.caption: Make an inappropriate remark

image.name: A3II.jpg
image.caption: Have a polite conversation

image.name: A3III.jpg
image.caption: Ask woman to go to McDonalds

image.name: B1I.jpg
image.caption: Leave briefcase in taxi

image.name: B1II.jpg
image.caption: Offend taxi driver and be taken to the wrong address

image.name: B1III.jpg
image.caption: Arrive early to job interview

image.name: B2I.jpg
image.caption: Kick man out of taxi

image.name: B2II.jpg
image.caption: Take man to persuasive friends

image.name: B2III.jpg
image.caption: Make man wash taxi

image.name: B3I.jpg
image.caption: Burn self with hot coffee

image.name: B3II.jpg
image.caption: Push cholesterol to the limit with triple cheeseburger meal

image.name: B3III.jpg
image.caption: Save half of cheeseburger for potential employer

image.name: C1I.jpg
image.caption: Be impressed by man’s initiative and hire him

image.name: C1II.jpg
image.caption: Not interview man because he unwittingly stole potential employer’s car

image.name: C1III.jpg
image.caption: Call police

image.name: C2I.jpg
image.caption: Outrun police and begin a life on the lam

image.name: C2II.jpg
image.caption: Bail from car and hide in sewer

image.name: C2III.jpg
image.caption: Get arrested

image.name: C3I.jpg
image.caption: Get arrested in drive-thru

image.name: C3II.jpg
image.caption: Abandon stolen car in parking lot

image.name: C3III.jpg
image.caption: Take stolen car and cheeseburger to job interview

image.name: A1Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man decides friendship is better than any job and never gets off the bus.

image.name: A1IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man forgets to silence cell phone in interview. Man does not get second interview.

image.name: A1IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Man infects potential employer via handshake. Potential employer falls ill and never calls man back.

image.name: A2Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man is picked up by van with out-of-state plates. Man is never heard from again.

image.name: A2IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man is not accustomed to exercise. Man collapses on sidewalk.

image.name: A2IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Man enjoys a cheeseburger and has sudden realization that his failure to commit in relationships stems from his own deeply held insecurities and that he and Tara should probably get back together.

image.name: A3Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man is slapped and called an impolite name.

image.name: A3IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man thinks the world suddenly feels a little less cold and for the first time notices the different shades of yellow in a nearby flower.

image.name: A3IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Woman’s personality is so-so, and man counts down the seconds until they finish their burgers and go their separate ways.

image.name: B1Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man’s resume was in his briefcase. Man does not get a second interview.

image.name: B1IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man decides to roll with it and interview for job at wrong address. Man gets job.

image.name: B1IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Man interviews well but is unimpressed with salary offer. He feels he is entitled to more even though he has no prior experience in the field. Man declines job offer.

image.name: B2Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man actually has money to pay the taxi driver but wanted to save it for lunch instead. Man eats lunch at McDonalds.

image.name: B2IIend.jpg
image.caption: Persuasive taxi driver friends get even more than the fare out of man. Man resolves to try Uber next time.

image.name: B2IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Man impresses taxi driver with washing abilities. Man is offered job as taxi driver.

image.name: B3Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man sues McDonalds for making hot coffee, wins a million dollars and never has to work again.

image.name: B3IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man has heart attack.

image.name: B3IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Man offers half a cheeseburger to potential employer. Man does not get second interview.

image.name: C1Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man returns stolen car and everyone laughs it off.

image.name: C1IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man waits until potential employer arrives. Man is recognized, detained and arrested.

image.name: C1IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Man tells long-winded story of how he actually should have been valedictorian in high school, but there was that one teacher that didn’t like him. Man is arrested before he finishes story.

image.name: C2Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man changes name and wears disguise, settles into a quiet life as a beekeeper in the Catskills.

image.name: C2IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man takes a good long look around the sewer, reflects on some of the decisions he’s made, decides to pursue an online degree.

image.name: C2IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Man does his time, is released early for good behavior and becomes an outspoken advocate for prison reform.

image.name: C3Iend.jpg
image.caption: Man decides that if he has to go down, he might as well go down in style. Man orders a large fries.

image.name: C3IIend.jpg
image.caption: Man notices that McDonalds is hiring. Man applies, starts working immediately.

image.name: C3IIIend.jpg
image.caption: Potential employer is at first put off by the whole stolen car thing, but lets it slide since the man brought a cheeseburger. Man gets job.
